ygData.subject: Re: level 20+ warriors?
ygData.msgSnippet: That is strange and what I was getting at, does something else apart from str (if even that) affect this supposed 1 point per level?
ygData.messageBody:
That is strange and what I was getting at, does something else apart from
str (if even that) affect this supposed 1 point per level?

> ----------
> From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 5:42 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] level 20+ warriors?
>
> From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
> Strange, I'm 28th and hitting for 44 with the BBC, dark elf.
>
> >>> "Jeff Lynch" <jlynch13@...> 5.24.99 3:32:13 PM >>>
> From: "Jeff Lynch" <jlynch13@...>
>
>
> I play a 31st level warrior on Povar and here is what I have found...
> using my BBC at level 20 I was doing max of 35 per hit.... At 30 I have
> been
> hitting 45... Looks something like 1 extra damage per level... and my
> strength is 104 (halflling)...
>
> I also know a 40th troll SK with a giant zweildhander... dam 18 delay
> 39...
> and he hits for 65 at max.... not sure what his strength is though :(
>
>
> Eogun
>
